body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Green Hospitality Services. My name is Raymond Green. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Raymond Green, my name is Teresa Rivera.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Teresa. Can you please provide me with your room number and check-in date for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number is two one four and I checked in on August twentieth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Teresa. I see that you've been staying with us for three days now. I apologize for any inconvenience. Could you also confirm your contact phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is eight six seven five five five zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Teresa. Rest assured, I will personally look into the matter regarding the clean towels for your room. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Teresa. We appreciate your feedback. If you need any further assistance, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
